content.detailedDescription:
This happened in 1969 i was a small child i was told i thought in a dream to come out side i could not i was to shoert to unlock the bolts on door in my mine it said it will be open or all right i was a child and only  remembered all this about 20 years or so ago. i saw 3 orbs in 1976 waiting for the school bus the were north east.
they had door open and was about 3 am i was ask by the voice from  black one the moon was very bright this i remember and it lit up the place this was normal it was either fall or winter, i was in my p.J.'s feet got cold from the gtound a voice would answer me before i could finish my sentence i was not scared at all they were not meen i was ask did i want to come with them and i did but i ask could i cime back and see my mom and dad in a second i was told they would not be back. lot of bad things have happened in my life_ i was a child i am now 56.
as they/one i dont know said that i wanted to say more but he said they had to go and the orange orb showed up to the east and it lifted (the large ship up) and my hair came forward to my face i thought was strange. i know they were other things said but i don remember them i have tried,  i  have told no one at all. this is the firzat time i have ever made any acknolagement
the next day mom said why is the bolts opened i was to short to open them she said i remember locking up last night. i said not a word i wish now i had went with the large craft, i did not know at my age what i saw or who  i was talking to in my mind, i felt i have been watched all my life even before i remember this.At times i can read some peoples thoughts..
many years i did not remember it but i have been depressed all my life.  i am on meds for this.

aome times i know things thts going to happen before they do but dont remember till it happens.
i have had lost time before i remembered this event.

this was no dream of a chil i will swear ro this.
content.summary: One black large with pointed anteni like above the craft dont remember a lot another orb came and it had to leave

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I am sorry i do not remember the exact date i saw this it was about
17 years ago or about 1997, i don't remember what month it was either
and i always wanted to tell someone this story.
i was driving to work 60 miles away so i leave early in the morning when it is still dark outside, i was driving from rialto ca. to glendale ca.
i was west bound on baseline avenue it was dark i was westbound in upland ca. and i was surprised to see a beautiful color green ball of light about 3/4 of a mile in front of me traveling from south to north, my guess is that it was about the size of a house or large automobile , now what i found most interesting about this object was that it definitely followed the contour of the earth, it was amazing, i watched it disappear over the foothills and mountains to my right side, it blew my mind, i was not afraid and i thought it was pretty neat.....
now here is the real kicker to the story....
when i arrived at work an hour later, i was talking to a woman who drives into work the same time as me and she comes from palmdale so she is driving from the north to the south and she starts to tell me and the other co workers that she saw a green ball of light fly by in front of her car!, how about that! this story is 100% true.
so obviously this object was under some kind of intelligent control
i estimate it speed at about 150 to 200 miles per hour, it was about 500 to 1000 feet above the ground and it followed the contour of the earth
it came out of the south (southern california) maybe from san diego ?
but neither me or my co worker were really too surprised , it's like nothing is too surprising anymore, oh yea it was just another ufo
but because of that experience i have no doubt we are being visited 
i don't know how our human race could have built any craft that could fly like that.
content.summary: Bright  green beautiful fireball traveling north

content.detailedDescription:
Adee, on march 22, 2014 at 12:14 am said: your comment is awaiting moderation.
hello sir,
not exactly sure what to say. i along with your other guests have lost time. i don���t believe that my time was like your others. i have checked maps, times and eta���s. i have found no reasoning why i (or my friend driving) should have lost time.
i see that you are still active on here, and that is my main reasoning for contact. my (our) incident occurred in 1998 in paris, tx.
my friend and i were on a trip to kansas from florida. we had not been on the road long enough to see delusions. we were on our way to paris, tx. ok, that is the last place that i remember going to before the incident. my friend was driving and i was in the passenger seat staring out the window. at 2200 i noticed what looked like airplane lights, flashing and blinking. at 65 mph, an airline or military plane would have surpassed us. but i noticed the lights were not blinking like they were supposed to. i watched for about 10 minutes before i said anything to my driver. i made a general comment that they looked like they were going backwards, not forwards. we kept driving for about 15 minutes before i said something else. i made mention of the odd lights again and we saw a place to pull off the side of the road and check things out. my driver slowed down and we got out of the car and watched the lights as they passed into the north. we got back into the car and proceeded on our way to ky. the light still to my east (driving north). we drove again and watched the lights head north and west around us. we thought that was the end.
i looked at the clock and the time was 2300. i looked again at the clock and looked at the road to make sure we were on track. the clock was fast and the sign that was approaching was mortifying. i looked at my driver and told her we had already been here. she sounded confused at what i said, but i again told her we had been here already. i looked back out my window of the passenger side of the car and saw the same place we had been an hour ago, and had pulled off to watch the lights. my third time telling her that we had already been here and this was what was coming up convinced here that she had not lost her mind. i suggested pulling over at a hotel, and we did. i think it was a holiday inn���.Not sure. we looked at each other after the incident and i had never been more afraid of anything in my life. i have never had the hair on my neck stand up or been more terrified in my life. i know goose bumps and chill bumps. this was completely different. i was in panic mode, so was my friend.
we decided to get back on the road and get the f*ck out of dodge.
we lost an hour that night. we will never know what happened in that time frame. we have checked maps to make sure we were not doubling back or getting lost. i saw the ���welcome to paris��� sign twice in my life and it scared the crap out of me. how in the hell did we get back to it the second time???
content.summary: Lost time for an hour.

content.detailedDescription: Gentleman my story is very long if you would call my phone i would tell you the whole andthen you can do what you want too with it i am going  on 70years and want to tell story. thanks
content.summary: Saw ufo on ground went back too get closer look heard trige snape sent too turn around felt something hot and cold

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was at home in my apartment,i had called the belmont and western police station in chicago il. i was speaking with police officers gregory becker,ofc.Fanelli,sgt.Libert and a female officer. i was seeking information,on my drivers license record.

2) a red laser like beam, and a spotlight from a maintenance vehicle at  midway airport. 

3) i thought it was a radio controlled hobby craft of somekind.

4) the outer material of the disk looked like galvenized sheet metal, with dents and a small door with a round handle on it. the outer edge was crimped over like a can top,with small rectangular depression on the inner radius. it hoovered at times, and appeared to jump from point to point. also glided and accelerated very qiuckly into the cloud cover.

5) pretty amazing to see close up.

6) accelerated vertically into the cloud cover, about 10 miles west of view.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The descriptives are varied due too, the incident involved multiple unknown obects over six and a half hour period of time.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband observed 2 stationary, round lights white lights just above tree level from a 3rd floor window of our home.  this is in the direction of the city airport and a view often surveyed from our home. he informed me and i watched the lights with him.  over the period of our observaton--approximately 2 hours, with periods of nonobservation, the lights did not appear to move and did not change in appearance. 

there were no observed effects of having seen the lights.  we did discuss that we have previously seen more distant and stationary lights in the same direction.  those previous ones appeared distant enough to be perceived as constellations, but were triangular formations, 3 white lights and occassionally, 2 white and one red (the red at the apex of the triangle).  these previous lights would often been seen as stationary over a period of hours.  we saw them so often that we no longer looked for them.  this recent incident was notable due to the apparent proximity to us.
content.summary: 2 stationary and round white lights

content.detailedDescription:
i was out fixing fence in cattle pasture. i noticed dead circles in the grass. 5 total,1 that is 8',2 that are 12', 2 that are 20'. nothing is left but dirt. circles are approx. 1'to18" wide. grass is green in the middle
and on the outside of dead circle. i was out in the pasture a few weeks ago and they were not there.
  our cows have aborted they're calves, during this time frame not sure why.
content.summary: Dead circles in pasture.

content.detailedDescription:
On 3/21/2014 @ approximately 2151 hours, i was in my driveway and saw a near transparent blimp shaped object flying at a high rate of speed, moving from east to west, and appeared to be following a straight line flight path.
the object was emitting a very low, almost inaudible pulsing humming sound.
i noticed the object because i noticed it's movement as it flew over a nearby water tower. it was very large, it appeared to be larger than a c-130,but not quite as large as a c-17. i lost sight of the object as it passed behind some trees, i ran out into the field adjacent to my driveway to see if i could get a better look at it but was not able to find it again.
as i stated the object was blimp shaped, but had what appeared to be a cylindrical object or attachment the ran across the lower front of the fuselage, perpendicular to the body of the craft.

i would like to point out that i was an air defense soldier in the u.S. army that received regular vacr (visual aircraft recognition) training, a retired volunteer firefighter with 21 years experience, as well as a detention officer for my local sherriff's office. i have grown up around military bases and see conventional aircraft on a daily basis.
this object is not any aircraft that i recognize, and i feel it was moving too fast to have been a blimp.
i also find it odd that the object was nearly transparent and appeared to be utilizing some sort of stealth technology. i believe the only reason i was able to see it at all is because the lights from the water tower illuminated it's edges.
content.summary: Nearly transparent blimp shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
Why is it i have never heard anything about the ufo
incident in gilbert. minnesota. i remember reading about i'm the paper when i was 9 years old. know the woman who the ufo terrorized her family that night and she still won't talk about if. see evefything else about ufos and i think this should be investigated. 

happened in the 60s. remember seeing an article in the local newspaper which has gotten me interested in ufos  & aliens. just would like to see if i investigated cause something

happened that night and the local paper even printed a. article on it. but never saw nothing on any tv shows about. photo
has nothing to do with it.  just want to know what happened that night
content.summary: Ufo scaring a family

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work on christmas eve heading south on us 231 when i noticed the ufos. i was just starting down waterworks hill into greencastle when a couple orangish-red lights caught my eye directly in front of me to south almost directly over greencastle. when i first saw them, i figured they were just airplanes, but i noted that the color was a little odd, and they looked slightly bigger than what an airplane looks like in the night sky.

so i kept my eye on them as i came into greencastle, and i noticed as i got to the bottom of waterworks hill next to the fairgrounds that i was now almost directly below them. when i noticed this, i quickly pulled off the road, just to make sure i was actually looking at airplanes. this is when i realized what i was watching was definitely not airplanes.  they were moving so slow, they almost looked like they were hovering.  but they were moving just fast enough that you could tell they were moving. they were moving in perfect unison probably no more than 200-250 feet apart.

i watched the two lights until they got directly above me when they just disappeared. this freaked me out a little bit because i had no explanation for where these lights went.  i blinked and they were just gone. i searched the sky and they were nowhere to be found.

so i sat there in this gravel lot on the side of the road for a second, just trying to figure out what i'd seen.  and just as i started to put the truck back in drive, i looked up and saw another light, that looked exactly the same as the first two, once again in the sky just south of me.

i was amazed that there was another one, but this time i took out my iphone to see if i could get some sort of picture of it. the weird thing was, though, the light would not show up in the camera on my phone, period, even though i made sure i was pointing it exactly where the light was. and just like the two lights before it, this light disappeared when it was almost directly over me.

i've always believed ufos were out there, but had never actually seen one to actually prove it. but i definitely believe that i saw my first ufos on christmas eve.
content.summary: Very slow orange lights move slowly over greencastle, then disappear

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home with my son from gettysburg to orrtanna this evening, i was getting ready to cross old route 30 from spigot valley rd and then go up bingaman rd which is very steep. this is pertinent because we were looking up a very steep hill into the sky and mountains and had our car not been angled , we probably wouldn't have noticed the very, very bright green light that suddenly appeared and streaked from south to southwest behind the tree line on newman mountain. no sound was noticed.
 my son and i witnessed the same thing. he at first thought it was a green reflection on the windshield.After he noticed it had gone behind the trees he changed his mind.
my impression was that it was a bright green, sizable meteor because of its velocity and path.
it moved almost horizontally at a slightly downward angle.
we would have been in a position to see more of its path, but it just seemed to appear, one second it wasn't there and the next it was, and then gone.
content.summary: Noticed very bright green light moving from s to sw for approx 1 second before went behind trees

content.detailedDescription: You can contact me.
content.summary: You can contact me. to much to list

content.detailedDescription:
On our way home from san diego, california to tucson arizona, my boyfriend and i were driving on interstate 8. first i witnessed what i thought was a plane, then i realized the lights were much bigger and there was no aircraft, there were 3 round orb-like and orange lights in the shape of a triangle that were moving/flying rapidly upward then suddenly disappeared. at first i was very confused at what it was that i saw and why/how it disappeared, and if it was a plane how this was possible? i was totally perplexed and almost wanted to disacknowledge what just took place. what made me notice this was the size and triangular shape of the object and how quickly it was flying upward. 
after 30 minutes later my boyfriend and i were having a conversation when i noticed in my peripheral vision one giant orange circular/orb like light to the right of my vision (south of gila bend - seemed to have been outside of ajo, arizona). this light was not moving in any direction it was staying still in one spot but it was almost the size of a penny, and was about 20-35 degrees above a mountain. we continued to watch it for 2 & 1/2 minutes until we watched it dissolve into nothing, dissolving from bottom first then top. it almost appeared to look like a mini sun, in the middle of the night, i compare it to this because of how bright it was and the intense aura of light it was emitting, the light was a very bright orange hue and it was sparkling almost like a fireball or star in the sky but much more intensely than anything i've ever seen. it appeared out of thin air, there was no trail or streak of light before it appeared, nor was there anything left behind when it disappeared. it just slowly faded away and was gone. while watching this i just had no idea what i was seeing, i knew it wasn't a plane or a flare because it would have left a streak or trail, i felt in shock at this point and awe at how bright this object was. i almost felt afraid because i had no way to explain what my eyes were witnessing. 
then about ten minutes later after we had driven away from the place we had stopped to watch it, we noticed that 4 more of these orbs appeared in a line. at this point we were further away from them, but they were the same color and shape ( bright orange orbs floating in same spot radiating intense light) then a minute later a 5th one appeared, and for the next 2-5 minutes these orbs continued to appear and disappear across different positions in the sky. out of nowhere once again, it was as if someone flicked a light switch when they just disappeared. however, when they were still in the sky it did look like they changed shape at one point into a diamond like shape, but then they returned back into orb/circular shapes flickering immensely almost like extremely bright stars/suns. at this point i felt extremely happy/excited that i had seen something out of this world and unexplainable i was just happy and calling everyone i knew sharing that i was witnessing some crazy lights radiating this intense orange light. then as i drove away i felt afraid and in shock for the unknown. at this point today i would just like to know what i had seen.
content.summary: Witnessed very bright orange orbs radiating orange hue of light in night sky middle of the desert

content.detailedDescription:
I had been cooped up in the room all day doing some work. sun was starting to go down and decided to go stretch my legs and go down to the water that's near by and sit and relax on a bench as i will tend to do. i was sitting there for about 10 minutes. looking around, then up into the sky to see the clouds and i spotted this white orb that was brighter than the brightest star at night. it was hovering but also slowly moving. i quickly took my phone out and snapped a photo first just in case and then switched to the video setting and hit record. shortly after it abruptly went backwards, then paused, then back more behind the trees and clouds for a split second before shooting right toward the north out off screen and out of view. i stopped recording and quickly went back to the apartment to show my roommates. 

when i first saw it i had no idea what it was but i have been a believer for a long time now and know that if i see something unusual and i have the ability to capture it on camera that's what i'm going to do. i have had 2 previous sighting from a few years ago but were quick events and unable to capture on camera. the first being a mass sighting that took place while living in southern maryland and two jets out of andrews air force base were chasing after. anyways, once i saw it moving then quickly move again i knew it wasn't man made and definitely was not some kind of weather related effect. there was intelligence in the way it moved.

i wasn't sure what to think or say or how to react. just wanted to watch it. i know there are all kinds of fakes videos out there so i wasn't sure how to react. i was calm in the fact that i am accepting of it but also a bit shaken because i wasn't sure what to do with the proof and how to go about telling people.
content.summary: Ball of light. wasn't completely spherical. rapid and sudden direction change. intelligently operated. somewhat transparent in center.

content.detailedDescription:
My 13 year old picked up her 8 year old sister from school. she is released at 2:30, and she goes to the elementary school immediately after to wait for them to be dismissed. she first spotted the object(s) while walking to the elementary school with three other people. all witnesses apparently thought they were looking at balloons at first. the object(s) began as three separate objects, all metallic and reflecting sunlight from the top, while dark/black metallic on the bottom.

the object(s) began very far apart and were sphere shaped, and then they moved very close together and formed a triangle formation but still separate objects. they hovered for a minute or two and then they began slowly ascending. 

the object that was the front point of the triangle moved down/backwards and the objects formed a line and became square shaped. the two on the sides rotated around the one in the middle to change directions, the object on the left was now on the top still in a line formation. they then hovered again for a minute or so. they slowly started going up until they became aspirin size. then the middle and the bottom object shot up and the third object stayed there for at least five minutes. she then turned to see her sister exit the building and when she turned back to look again the last object was gone.

the three boys that were with her saw the third one shoot upward, but they said it moved in a spiral motion as it moved upward, then it disappeared.

while we can clearly see the great salt lake from our home, as well as from both schools, these objects were several miles away while being observed.

it may also be worth noting that while i (her mother) did not see these objects, i did witness a man standing on the sidewalk with binoculars looking toward the great salt lake while i, unfortunately, was driving in the opposite direction!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over great salt lake ut

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and nephews were staying on his pontoon boat on sutton lake one summer evening. we were tied off back in one of those coves fishing and swimming. as evening approached, we didn't have any flashlight and were unable to build a fire. it was approaching 9-10 p.M. and i was the only one still awake, trying out my new night fishing equipment. 
it was pitch black that night with no moonlight. only light noticable was my new light-up bobber i was trying out. as i sat there checking my line thinking about the fun we had that day, i noticed a round bright glowing light from behind the trees in front of me. as i kept watching, the light slowly appeared over the treetops and flew right over the cove where our boat was tied off and disappeared behind us in the treetops. there was no sound, no other lights indicating it was not a plane. before it went out of sight i quickly woke up one of my nephews to see it. 
i've read all the stories of ufo sightings in the past and that was the first thing i thought of and still to this day believe that's what it was. it happened so fast that i just sat there stunned as it passed beyond the treetops over me. i have never told anyone because no one seems to believe me but i am reporting it now, god as my witness, and my nephew to the events of that dark, quiet evening on sutton lake in braxton county, wv.
content.summary: Bright light, no sound crossed over treeline and crossed sutton lake over my head.

content.detailedDescription: At about 7:30 p.M. i was in my patio on the phone with my daughter. i looked out my patio windows and saw one very large glowing ball with a tail and one smaller one. my daughter looked out her window and said she saw the same thing. we were both very excited knowing we were looking at something very strange. the smaller ball was traveling south with a tail behind it and we lost sight of it. the larger ball stayed stationary for a few minutes then started going straight up till no longer in our sight. then i noticed a red large circle of looked like smoke.  to the right of that where the smaller ball was there was a long red line. the larger ball glowed very bright and stayed stationary for about 4 or 5 minutes, then rose very slowly till out of sight.
content.summary: A very large glowing ball with a tail and the second one looked the same but smaller

content.detailedDescription:
1: en el patio trasero tomando caf���
2: grite a mi hermano y ami mama para que vinieran a verlo tambi���n
3: incre���ble,
4: se mov���a hacia los lados y hacia arriba, destellaba luz que aparec���a y desaparec���a.
5: nervios, emoci���n,
6: desaparecio y de repente aparecio y se veia mucho mas lejano y se fue moviendo hata q desaparecio de mi vista por lo lejano imagino

content.detailedDescription: I was in the bedroom when i had a compulsion to take a photograph, when i lifted the camera to the window the first object was in the picture,i took the first picture.In disbelief i looked and could not see the object with my eyes.I then looked back to the camera and captured the object flying away in 4 more pictures as it changed shape.In the 6th picture is a much larger anomalous object in the cloud line.When i reviewed the pictures in all honesty my first thought when i saw the first object was the realisation of what i had photographed.
content.summary: A series of 6 photographs showing one object in motion and a second in the cloud line.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine and i were working at his house in palos verdes. i was at the bottom of his driveway raking leaves. for some reason i looked up in the sky to the north and saw an object hovering. i called to my friend george and told him to come quick and see what i was looking at.
it was shinny silver in appearance, disc shaped and the size of a dime held at arms lenth. it looked like it was slighltly wobbling as it hovered. we watched it for several minutes as it was stationery in the same place.
then all of a sudden it started to move horizontally and then changed direction back to where it was and then it climbed at a terrific rate almost straight up. we watched it until it went out of sight. 
both of us were amazed at what we had seen. we had no idea of what it was but of one thing we were certain, it was not an airplane. aiplanes don't do what this thing did.
years later as an airline pilot i was reading the project blue book and came across a report of sightings at about the same time as our sighting over the long beach airport. they had contact on their radar of objects in the area. as i remember the airforce scrambled some f-89s to intersept the ufo's.
i have always wondered if our sighting was connected to the one over long beach?
content.summary: Clear day sighting north of palos verde of metalic disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
I must mentions that i live in lancaster, ca which is not too far from edwards air force base. i have lived out here for a very long time, so i can tell the difference between a helicopter or other air vehicles. 

it was at 9:20pm that i stepped outside with my dog to allow my dog to relieve himself before we went to bed. i noticed that there was a strange blinking light in the sky. i didn't think much of it until i decided to sit down and keep looking at this strange light. i noticed that it had pulsating lights of red, white, yellow and sometimes blue. i decided to go inside to look at the time, just in case i would have to report this here. the time was 9:26. i went back outside and sat down and sat still just to make sure it wasn't a star or moving like a helicopter. but this light/thing was moving from side to side and moving very slowly up. it would stop and hover there for a while and then continue to move up slowly moving side to side. it was too high up to be a helicopter that would be searching for someone and it was way too steady. i also noticed that at times the light would dim almost to the point that i could hardly see it. and then it would light up again but brighter and it continued to do this as well. i sat there until 10:03pm. it's now 10:52pm and i just checked outside to see if it was still there and it's no longer there. not sure what it was but it was very strange. and i apologize for not giving my info to report this, but i don't want people thinking i'm crazy. i know what i saw and i couldn't record this because my cameras are junk especially at night. goodnight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange light

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I am a musician i was playing a show in hamden ct but i realized i had forgotten my mic stand. so my friend and i jumped in the car to get it from my studio in wallingford. when we walked out of the building my friend pointed to the sky and said what's that. i looked up and saw a large disk silently floating over my head at a very low altitude. less than 1000ft. 

my initial reaction was to say to him " don't let them see you" and i step quickly back in to the shadow of the building. this reaction has always puzzled me because my friend just stood and stared at it right out in the open. we watched it pass over us very slowly. 
maybe 20 miles an hour. this is just a guess because once it passed we decided to follow it. 

the craft was headed back toward the hamden/cheshire line.  when we got to rt 10 the craft had gained on us and went over a hill. since we could no longer keep up with it. we went back to my gig. we walked in and told everyone we had just seen a ufo. they must have thought we were crazy because they totally dismissed our story.

the next morning it was all over the news papers that 13 guy from nj 
were flying ultra lights in a circle formation as a hoax.

this was not the case. i was directly under the ship and saw its shape. it was constant. no fluctuations. it was also completely silent.. 13 ultralights would have sounded like 13 people were cutting there lawn above us... there was no sound...

i knew immediately this was a cover story... and not a very good one...
years later i searched the web to see if i could find any information on this event. 
much to my surprise. i did... someone in a neighboring town took the picture i am about to attach but it is exactly what i saw slowly float directly over my head...

please feel free to contact me i would love to hear anything you may know about this event that i have never learned...

thank you

ps the event date above is incorrect. the time is pretty close because my shows always started around 8:00. i could find the actual date by checking new haven register news paper accounts and matching them up with my gig schedule that year. i played that bar every week for 6 months or so. my recollection was it was late summer. but honestly i am afraid that is all i can say without checking. my friend who i have not seen in 20 years may recall the exact date and time. i would love to hear his account of the event. i understand he is now some sort of official with the state. i am willing to be interviewed and would love to hear any additional information you may have on this event.
content.summary: Floated 500 to 1000 ft over us silently. i followed it in my car for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Was waiting in my car sending a few text messages before getting out, probably 10 minutes. got out of car and looked up, it was high enough that i almost could have missed it. very bright orange ball of light, almost like a plane headlight but bigger than it should have been for that distance - i would estimate no more than a mile away. the orange ball of light looked like an ember that was burning in a fire, brighter and darker all over - looked like a fire burning way up in the sky and in a ball. under the ball were two distinctly different red flare-like lights that looked to be set in at a 45 from the bottom of the ball in opposing directions. the object movement at first was almost like it was swinging like a lantern, left and right only very slightly and somewhat slowly/rhythmically. over the course of the minute or so of the sighting, it slowly grew dimmer and dimmer until it was only a pinprick smaller than any visible star, then it went out. 

did not make a noise. when it first appeared it was at about a 50 or 55 degree angle from the ground, but by the time it had vanished i was probably viewing from a 45.
content.summary: Bright orang ball, two red flare-like lights underneath at 45 degree angle. hovered with slight movement - faded slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
I brought my friend along with me on a business trip to a route that included redding, mt. shasta , and weaverville, heading home through the chico area. 

on 3/19/14 we started our day in mt. shasta , heading to weaverville after my first appointment. as we were leaving around 9:30am we both noticed the beginning of heavy chem trail spraying in the bright blue sky. as the day proceeded and we advanced to redding then onto weaverville , the chem trail spraying continued heavily. this became the theme of the day, unfortunately , as we both we taken aback by the amount of spraying in the sky as well as the head aches that followed. 

on our way home...


as i was driving , my friend shouted out that there was something in the sky. i pulled the car over when i had the chance and also saw 3 large sphere-like objects that were white that seemed to be observing the chem trails , sort of surrounding one of them. the observatio of these spheres that turned into 4 total lasted for 2 hours time- until we drove away from them on our way home. 

to be perfectly clear- these spheres were mostly suspended and fixed in one point each in the sky ... this sighting happened around 5pm-7pm while it was still very light out. 

at one point , when i was watching, they changed color slightly into a pink then blue- but mostly were and illuminated white. 

they were also seemingly very large although they also seemed to be far away, also at one point they seemed to rotate or do something that made it look like they changed shape, sort of getting skinny, then going back to normal. 

my personal beleife is that these objects were ufo s and that it had something to do with the heavy chem trails that day. one thing to mention as well is that i don't think many people observed these spheres because you had to look up at the sky, and most people were busy with driving or doing earth bound things... i think that there are more ufo s that go unnoticed because most people don't look up..They are too busy.M
content.summary: My friend and i witnesses four illuminated , large and mostly stationary spheres that seemed to be observing heavy chem trails in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling from dc into md on georgia ave & car radio started malfunctioning, lots of static.  i turned it down and kept driving and noticed a very bright light to my left at first it looked like a star but when i got to a red light there was no cloud cover, no trees and i could see a bright white, pulsating object. looked like an hourglass standing upright with rounded ends. i rolled my window down and took 2 pictures with my cell phone (iphone 5s) i zoomed in as much as i could. the light turned green so i kept driving. it was in my sight until i got home i was never able to turn the radio back on for about a 15 minute drive. it was still static. the object was still in the sky when i got home. i even had my teenager come outside to see it but we got scared so we went in the house.  when i looked at the pictures it looks like it's 2 objects and they split.  with my eyes i did not see this. the window was open and the car was stopped when the pictures were taken. no clouds. in the picture there is a lamp post to the right and the 2objects to the left. in one picture they are one above and below each other. in the next picture one object has moved to the left. i did not see them separate. they still looked like one object standing upright in the shape of an hourglass.
content.summary: Bright white, pulsating object. looked like an hourglass standing upright with rounded ends.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was the early  morning of march 15,2014. my husband and myself were camping on the  brazos river near blum texas. we were out doing some morning fishing. right before getting out of the car i noticed a white light flying toward us. at first i thought it was an airplane so i didn't pay much mind to it. then it stopped moving. it was flying low maybe 500 feet in the air and was a across the river from us. for almost two hours it stayed in the same area, moving only a little bit at a time. it would sway side to side, move up and then down. it was a single very bright white light, it was like the brightest star youve ever seen only this light was about 500 ft in the air. i told my husband that we had to wait until the sun came up to see what it would do. we had completely ditched fishing and just sat in the car gazing  with  curiosity and disbelief. we knew that not only where we watching this ufo,  but that it was definitely watching us too. as the sun started to come up we watched it slowly ascend into the sky, in a straight line, and at a consistent speed. we video taped it and watched it ascend through the morning clouds until it was so far away we could no longer see it. we have video of it while it was still dark outside , when it started to ascend to space as the sun started to rise and we have video of it after the sun was up and you can still see it through the clouds. this was by far the weirdest experience of my life. i have had doubts about ufos and aliens but this affirmed it for me and now i am a true believer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: A white orb of light flew into our view at about 5:00 am. at first i thought it was an airplane but then it stopped moving. for the next two hours it hovered above us swaying left and right. when the sun came up we watched it ascend at an angle into space

content.detailedDescription:
My son,daughter and myself were driving just northeast of delmont sd on a gravel road. i turned onto a low maintenance dirt road heading north. i never noticed anything unusual about the night. we were talking and laughing just enjoying our ride when about a half mile into the dirt rode i saw movement in the left hand dide of the ditch.I slowed a bit as i wasnt going much over 40 but i thought it was a deer and didnt want to hit it.
i watched ad this "thing" stepped onto the road..The kids got quiet and i knew they had to have seen it too.
i compare it to the little "geico" on the insurance commercial. it stood maybe 6-7 foot it was white/grey almost like it was reflecting the headlights. its head was alligator shaped but with a stubby snout and looked like its mouth was attatched like a alligator. it was upright on two skinny legs the body was long and skinny with two unusually long arms with long fingers, i couldnt see how many. it didnt look our way but i could tell its eyes were located more to the side rsthet than front. as it stepped noticed it feet lookef like swim flippers but narrower. it took one step up from the the ditch and and two move it was to the othet side and gone. i was shocked,ive never seen anything like this in my life.Oh yes,it didnt have a tail to speak of but rather a triangle shaped nub..I dont know but it scared me as much as it made me curious. ive thought about it since the sighting if im crazy all threr of us are..We dont know what we saw there arent creatures in rural sd like this and definitely not aligstors or giant geicos. i dont go out evenings for a relaxing drive any more..Really dont want to be out alone at night at all. scary
content.summary: Saw a creature of some kind on a country road

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out side to smoke and just as i looked straight south from my porch i noticed what seemed to be a large flock of birds that was glowing and moving in my direction.  as it progressed north it passed directly over my head at a very high altitude.I could see the space between the lights(which were round and a weird yellowish orange with a diffused white background)seemed to be shaped like an outline of a birds wing.Seems to be connected to similar shaped pieces of craft to make a doublerow of lights in front and along sides in a singular line. looked be be v shaped while looking south but when it got overhead it looked like a fat twinkie traveling fast and direct. i have seen alot of aircraft and this would have taken 100 airliners to span that amount of space at that altitude. it continued north out of site. i ran round to the other side of the house and watched it continue north.The shape of the grill stood out between the lights though it was the only real part that did not get blurred by the strange glowing lights. no pulsing or blinking occurred. no sounds i have 10 years military service and spent years on an aircraft carrier.I have seen alot of aircraft but never this sized which really was freaking amazing. i can describe the grill as black x but the lines kinda curved making them look like wings which was a pattern across the front. very creepy i raised my hand straight out when it was overhead and it still was bigger than my hand.
content.summary: Massive craft with yellow glow and light orange lights behind black swan shaped grill

content.detailedDescription:

primeiro eu fiquei paralisada e depois comecei a gritar chamando minha m���e e meu irm���o para ver o disco voador, mas quando minha m���e e meu irm���o aparecem ele come���a a girar de novo, e meu irm���o vem correndo pra ver e ele at��� consegue ver um pouco o ovni, mas do nada desapareceu.
content.summary: Vi uma ovni igual dos filmes no quintal da minha casa.
content.locationName: São José dos Campos, São Paulo

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine was in antioch visiting a friend on friday, march 14, 2014.  while they were outside in the evening they observed this orange orb hovering above them.  my friend immediately started filming it using her cell phone.  they observed it for a little over 2mns before it went away.  her cell has smudges on it as you can see but the first few seconds of the video you can see the object clearly.  she gave me a copy of it and as she was not sure what to do with it and told me to give to an appropriate authority.  because i know of you from watching a show that features your sightings i asked her for a copy of it to send to you.
content.summary: Object observed was a glowing orange orb, that hovered, moved erraticly then moved slowly away into the atmosphere
